Draco: Harry, stop eating me with your eyes.
Harry: Then how should I be doing this?
Draco: With your di-
Ron: Please, not in...
body:
Draco: Harry, stop eating me with your eyes.

Harry: Then how should I be doing this?

Draco: With your di-

Ron: Please, not in front of my chicken.

summary:
index . plot . face claim . want ads

 Technology has come to the wizarding world, and with it, chaos. While many support the...
caption:
index . plot . face claim . want ads

Technology has come to the wizarding world, and with it, chaos. While many support the progress into the modern era, there are those who oppose it, seeing it as an abandonment of the wizarding way of life and a threat to the Statute of Secrecy.

Age of Aquarius is a modern tech Harry Potter site that is over two years old!

A war has begun; a radical group calling themselves the Tutors have attacked and blood has been spilled.
Lines are being drawn in the sand; which side will you choose?

summary: Wolfstar (Sirius Black x Remus Lupin) RP?
body:
Wolfstar (Sirius Black x Remus Lupin) RP?

Hi guys! Is anyone willing or looking for a semi-literate to literate rp partner? I can play Bottom Remus and Bottom or Top Sirius. I’m not comfortable with Top Remus yet.

I’m willing to do:

-18+

-A/B/O dynamics

- background characters

- anything really I’ll express to you if I don’t like or feel comfortable with an idea

Just message me here or message me on discord if you’re interested!

Discord: Lala#4239

summary: Home | Alias Sorting | Plot & Setting | Face Claims | Character Apps Want Ads | Discord Chat | YHE Tumblr YHE is a seven year...
body:
Home | Alias Sorting | Plot & Setting | Face Claims | Character Apps
Want Ads | Discord Chat | YHE Tumblr

YHE is a seven year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own. It is a site created by fans and built upon by fans. We are set in 2029. Focused on the United Kingdom with locations all over England, Ireland, Scotland and soon Wales. Plots are character driven with monthly events that offer a way to meet new people with no effort. The more members we have the more locations we will add. We have no word count and a shipper app with relaxed activity rules. If you have an idea you have wanted to try in the HP world we are the place for you to do that.

Come and check us out!

title: Coming Soon
body:
I’m back, with a Draco Malfoy story. Some backstory before Y'all read it, I took Lucky Blue Smiths siblings and renamed them and made those Draco’s siblings. Also, I know they have odd names, it’s hard for find cute space names.

Anywho, Heres a lil spoiler to a new series:

“She told herself ‘it is easier to let someone go by hating them, rather than by loving them’ so she started to make a list ‘Reasons to Hate Draco Malfoy’. She decided that twenty reasons were enough considering it took her a week to think of them, and for every con, there would be five pros.” Chapter One: Backstory from ‘A Set Of Rules’ written by me

The first chapter will be published next week, look out for it.

Chapter One: Backstory | Chapter Two: Westbrooks | Chapter Three: Malfoy | Chapter Four: A Party, an Ending

title: Show Me Love
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FgwemJ

by magikatherine

James Potter and Lily Evans have been made Head Boy and Head Girl of Hogwarts. Their new living quarters and shared responsibilities makes it hard for them to avoid each other, but Lily’s resolved to be mature and James… well, who knows what’s going on in James’ head. This is a story of how one year changed the lives of the Head Boy and Head Girl from the class of 1978.

Words: 1357, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: James Potter, Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Peter Pettigrew, Alice Longbottom, Marlene McKinnon, Minerva McGonagall, Albus Dumbledore, Severus Snape
  • Relationships: James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Alice Longbottom/Frank Longbottom
  • Additional Tags: Hogwarts Head Boys & Head Girls, Falling In Love, Inspired by Music


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FgwemJ

title: Fic Rec - Harry Potter
body:
An Act of Simple Devotion

blamebrampton

Summary:

It’s a age-old story. You fancy a boy and you think he fancies you. Sure there are problems – attacks on former Death Eaters, crazed tabloid journalists, evangelical references, and your girlfriend – but you have a cunning plan …

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FgwemJ

summary:
Ron: If South Africa is in Africa, then West Virginia must be in Virginia. 
Hermione: Yes, and New England is a state in...
body:
Ron: If South Africa is in Africa, then West Virginia must be in Virginia.

Hermione: Yes, and New England is a state in America.

Ron: No, didn’t you listen to what I just said? New England has to be in England, Hermione.

Harry: …

summary: I like to imagine that a younger Draco would glimpse this in The Mirror of Erised and would never imagine the possibility that...
